```robotframework
=========  ===============================
 Setting               Value
=========  ===============================
Resource   md_resource2.md
=========  ===============================
```

* Different table format

```robotframework
+--------------------+----------------------------+-------------+
|       Variable     |             Value          |    Value    |
+====================+============================+=============+
| ${md_resource_var} | Markdown Resource Variable |             |
+--------------------+----------------------------+-------------+
```

Finally some keywords

```robotframework
===============================  ============
      Keywords                     Whatever
===============================  ============
Keyword from Markdown resource   No Operation
===============================  ============
```
